user.title: Configure Nightscout Extended - Connection
user.description:
Connect to your Nightscout server.

**Step 1 of 2:** Connection and Glucose Unit

preferences.title: Configure Nightscout Extended - Preferences
preferences.description:
Set your target glucose range and DDNS settings.

**Step 2 of 2:** Target range is automatically set based on {glucose_unit}.

Optional: Configure DDNS for automatic DNS updates.

error.cannot_connect:
Не удалось подключиться к Nightscout. Проверьте:
• URL должен быть полным: https://ваш-nightscout.com
• Сервер должен быть доступен
• Если требуется, добавьте API Key
• Проверьте логи для деталей
error.unknown: Произошла неожиданная ошибка. Проверьте логи Home Assistant

abort.already_configured: This Nightscout server is already configured

init.title: Update Nightscout Settings - Connection
init.description:
Update connection and glucose unit.

**Step 1 of 2:** If you change the glucose unit, target ranges will be automatically converted.

preferences.title: Update Nightscout Settings - Preferences
preferences.description:
Update target range and DDNS settings.

**Step 2 of 2:** Values shown are for {glucose_unit}.

Note: After changing DDNS settings, the next update will be performed automatically.
